channel.title: [317] [Aggroth V4] original - The Final Release
channel.description:
I quit.
I cannot be bothered anymore, i just don't have the motivation to continue any of my projects. I quit every single project that i'm in. I will be around, add my skype if you need me, but dont PM me on rune-server anymore.
Ranks: [spoiler=Ranks] 0) Player 1) Bronze Donator 2) Iron Donator 3) Adamant Donator 4) Rune Donator 5) Dragon Donator 6) Dicer 7) Veteran 8) Helper or Test Mod 9) Moderator 10) Administrator 11) Co-Owner 12) Owner 13) Developer
All these ranks have their own icons [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Adv thread][B][SIZE=2][Aggroth V4]
To start off, i'd like to explain to you what exactly Aggroth is. Aggroth is a project long ago started from InsidiaX. I have managed to fix 99% of all memory leaks and bugs. The server had 477 people online at one time, and this was also our record. There was no lag at all.
I have tried to mix up oldschool with newschool as much as i could. This is why there is a 700+ skilltab interface (Full credits for that go to TrisidiaX). And also drygores, and off-handed drygores were added. Along with nex, and alot of bosses.[/SIZE][/B]
Features: -A very clean system, every memory leak i know of was fixed, along with every dupe in InsidiaX, with VERY clean results. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/06033ffffc5e19e01cef903064cc1f33.png[/img] -The client has been completely redone, with alot of help from my co-developer, Ryan. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c0f4250666c7e15b6d31118471779018.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/90184dbe613a6bf1241cfab37dad53ea.png[/img] -Inside the server is a great new dungeoneering system, there has been only one area added. How does it work? 1) You kill the guards around there for dungeoneering points and XP. 2) Sometimes, they drop beers, these can be traded in for 100K experience, when you talk to the extremely thirsty workers. 3) Continue Process [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8fa3f9257e1eaeab7bfe10c95b7a0343.gif[/img] -Fully working drygores, all main hand and offhand have been added. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0922709bb223f1a46da04574c2907d7f.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/18d7c5c692503fa26864453c643782e1.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/af6ab9d271f969c583b8c04989d697db.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/02e51ce5520ba13a3ee9cc80a1f0b5a0.png[/img] -Fully working SAGITTARIAN has been added!!!!! That's right, Aggroth is the one and only, together with GrinderScape, 317 PI that has FULLY working sagittarian! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a41314503085ec5b7a3cb08c0b3edcd4.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/365f637bacb44641a71ddec706235adf.gif[/img] -A full quest (made by Ryan) -BoneCrusher has been fully added (by Ryan) -A new information tab and a new points tab has been added! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3d25ebd12339428d231db0869cce8206.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/996a8c6eb597b75de9d8b48e1c48dc51.png[/img] -Full completionist capes have been added! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f518cec0cf8c98fdff417a4b02ff53e2.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/dfddcf7fae9a66c3c9af2dea78742cef.png[/img] Along with ofcourse... MAX! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0b3aa333b6d0118178fee54f3b2071bc.png[/img]
The clan chat has been fully redone, and also fixed the clan chat name through your own name bug. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b4beed7ae0be00f5feec4421aab9ec88.png[/img]
The skill tab of the 718 revision has been added, completely flawless! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/936b90f9e33863696a85d5d8dfd7402d.png[/img]
The equipment tab has been improved with the "IoD" feature! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5c7b6cc6f7a6259bd8269e0345c3abe1.png[/img]
The wilderness ditch has been redone after we added it, because it was extremely bugged. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/38c6fffd470273131602436f85c2d6d6.gif[/img]
New points stores has been added, and a nice method on how you can enter the store. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6d469b6d4145ece27785b24347eaf0a1.png[/img]
----------------------------------------------------Known Bugs: The "Add Friends" and "Add Ignore" options still dont work, i'm simply running out of time, and i do not know how to fix this. I am 90% sure it is a client sided issue, so with a little bit of effort, you'll figure it out.
The buy X option, is not working. I have removed it and added buy 50 instead, because i don't have time to redo the whole BuyItem method.
There's just so much to discover, I cannot give you everything on this topic, it will just take too long. But i do hope you liked how me and Ryan have improved Aggroth.
[U]This is the last update.[/U] That's right. I'm quitting the project Aggroth, because i no longer have time to improve the server.
_______________________________________ The server comes with a complete package, Client, Server, Cache, and even the website files. You will receive the Auto-Donation system by Martin, fully redone so it fits Aggroth. You will receive HighScores, fully redone so it fits Aggroth. And you will receive the GTLVoting system, which works extremely well.
I will give you a copy of Aggroth V4, for only 10$. This is because i sort of need money, and i spend so much time working on it. About 3-4 years.
You can contact me on skype, or on this topic. _______________________________________ Copies sold: 7
Credits: Shaloxis Ryan Faris TrisidiaX Tokashi[/spoiler]
Enjoy, credits are always nice, don't release this anywhere else without asking me.
Package: -Source -Client -Website files -Some more shit (Cache will download automatically when running, dont forget to compile first)
[url=http://skype:waddafoock?add]Click here to request a download[/url]
Credits: Me (Cant be arsed naming all that) Ryan (Fixed ALOT of bugs and added a nice quest) InsidiaX (Base) TrisidiaX (Skilltab) Tokashi (508 maps)
P.S I really thank all of you for all that i have learned. I learned not to give up when something does not work out the way you want it to work out, and i learned that most of the people on this planet are dicks

item.title: [317] [Aggroth V4] original - The Final Release
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Yungg, post:101, topic:545873”]How would I go about editing the name of the folder which the cache downloads to so that it doesn’t say Aggroth anymore?

Also; how would I change where the client downloads the cache from so that I can use a custom cache?

Also #2; when I run the client, it opens a .jar file… am I not able to edit the client itself because of this?

Thanks in advance![/quote]
1/2: Signlink.java?
3: It doesn’t open a jar file. it runs the client class. unless you specified it to open a jar.

Read full topic

thank you very much! i bought a vps but i wanne setup the donate/vote/forums but i really need help if you can do it for me through skype /tv or something for like 5$-10$ or something ? or is that illegal let me know thanks in advance

Illegal? No.
However, payment isn’t allowed to be talked to on the forums. Just a heads up.

hey mate hit me up on skype! james.blenders

will do now

Try not to use the topics to have your own discussions.

yet this server is for sale not download?

No, it’s not?

The server comes with a complete package, Client, Server, Cache, and even the website files.
You will receive the Auto-Donation system by Martin, fully redone so it fits Aggroth.
You will receive HighScores, fully redone so it fits Aggroth.
And you will receive the GTLVoting system, which works extremely well.

I will give you a copy of Aggroth V4, for only 10$.
This is because i sort of need money, and i spend so much time working on it.
About 3-4 years.

You can contact me on skype, or on this topic.

Copies sold:
7

Credits:
Shaloxis
Ryan
Faris
TrisidiaX
Tokashi
[/quote]

This site doesn’t allow people selling servers (or anything). Soo.
Plus I have a copy of it hosted right here:
http://canyourcode.com/rsps/[/quote]
that was cold medicine that typed that -____-
